name: The last flame (itch)
description:
You are a flame that is going out, your goal is to reach the chimney by lighting all the lamps of the labyrinth that will give you more time next to the candles to keep you burning.

HOW TO PLAY:

Your life is decreasing while you are playing, light the lamps around you to recover life. Try not to fire, your life will be decreased if you do that.

-WASD to move the flame. -Use the mouse to rotate the flame. -LMB to fire flames.
